pages.text: $(bold)What you need:$()$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/crafting#kefir_jar)-kefir jar$()$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/crafting#kefir_jar)-kefir tumbler$()$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/curd_pot)-whey$()$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/kefir_crystals)-kefir crystals$()$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/getting_fruits)-a fruit$()$(br2)Add whey and kefir crystals in the kefir jar. After you filled in a fruit of your choice wait 10 seconds. With a kefir tumbler you can get your kefir.
